channel.title: Stronghold of Security
channel.description:
Hello, I've been working on my upcoming project for about 5 months now. It's strictly only been me and my partner Phase developing everything. Yesterday I launched our official Open Beta, we've decided it's time we would like to start trying to grow our community. Today me & Phase introduced the Stronghold of Security. Which I've never seen in a RSPS before. Anyway here's some the media.
Stronghold of Security with real RS rewards. [spoiler=] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/apd94z.png[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/2meag7a.png[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/20z8pp1.png[/img] [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/dpiddc.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/mhy0i8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/i6a25d.jpg[/img] [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/3503s5x.jpg[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/55q79s.jpg[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/zunrjq.jpg[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/332172g.jpg[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/js1qnp.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
If you're interested in playing Nibiru, checkout our MoparScape advertisement thread here; https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,674134.msg4507114.html#new
Do not let the bland appearance deceive you, we're a non-profit RSPS, and we aren't currently accepting donations. We have a high expense rate for our project, and are paying everything out-of-pocket, so our availability to good GFX right now is limited.
[center][u][b]Update 4/18/2016:[/b][/u][/center]
Finished stage one of the Stronghold of Security Started the second stage.
[spoiler] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/wa225v.png[/img] [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/xfuhwo.png[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/15wm1ea.jpg[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/4puz5v.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/2urtva1.png[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: Stronghold of Security
item.dc:creator: @Project_Nibiru Project Nibiru
item.description:
@Project_Nibiru wrote:

[quote=“Arbe, post:4, topic:555213”][quote author=Project Nibiru link=topic=674139.msg4507124#msg4507124 date=1460879157]

A lot of grammar errors, but otherwise looks like what it should.

I will work on fixing the Dialogues. I am debating making only a few selected doors that work. That way it is also a maze. Answering the wrong question will teleport you back to the beginning.
[/quote]
Looking decent but…

I’ll give you a tip. Think of your game as a Player. Would you want to be teleported back every time you answered the questions wrong, regardless of how easy the answer is. They’d get bored and annoyed and all that time spent would equal dead content. No you wouldn’t like it either, unless there was a reward; a decent one.

#my2c.[/quote]

[quote=“Arbe, post:6, topic:555213”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=674139.msg4507256#msg4507256 date=1461166454]
This is one of those things in RuneScape that you absolutely hated going through but it was the quickest way to get some starting gold. Don’t make it annoying for the player, it’s a private server.
[/quote]
:)[/quote]

Thank you for the feedback, I have deeply taken it into consideration and will be improving it.
Stage two has been completed, and Stage 3 is in the works now.

Read full topic

[/quote]

I will work on fixing the Dialogues. I am debating making only a few selected doors that work. That way it is also a maze. Answering the wrong question will teleport you back to the beginning.[/quote]
Looking decent but…

I’ll give you a tip. Think of your game as a Player. Would you want to be teleported back every time you answered the questions wrong, regardless of how easy the answer is. They’d get bored and annoyed and all that time spent would equal dead content. No you wouldn’t like it either, unless there was a reward; a decent one.

#my2c.
